Topic.Title: How to Save and Restore on Web

Posts.EditableText: How does one save and later restore to a save point in a web version of a Quest game? Thanks!
Posts.HTML: How does one save and later restore to a save point in a web version of a Quest game? Thanks!

Posts.EditableText: If you are logged in you can press 'save' in the upper right corner, then you can resume you game at this point if you start it again
Posts.HTML: If you are logged in you can press 'save' in the upper right corner, then you can resume you game at this point if you start it again
